about_data.title: Introduction
about_data.content: Hello, my name is Berat Kamali. I'm 21 years old and I'm an applied informatics student, specializing in mobile and enterprise development. I have a passion for technology and a keen interest in exploring new tools and technologies to build innovative solutions.

education.context: Currently studying Applied Informatics at HoGent, specializing in Mobile & Web Development.
Acquired my high school diploma for Accounting and Informatics (Boekhouden-Informatica TSO).

work.context: Served as a salesman selling electronics and insurances.

about_data.title: Future goals
about_data.content:
Information Technology is a field drawn by continuous change, where staying up-to-date and adapting quickly are essential.
 
 By commiting to lifelong learning, I aim to contribute innovative projects and remain at the cutting edge inside the IT field.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio (current)
projects.description: A personal portfolio website where I showcase my skills, projects, education and professional experience.

projects.name: Mangaverz
projects.description: Mangaverz is a school project designed for users to create their personal collections of their favorite mangas. The primary purpose of the platform is to help users keep track of their reading progress for each manga.

projects.name: MSCYoutubeSummarizer
projects.description:
MSCYoutubeSummarizer's purpose is to provide users with a brief overview of a video's content, helping them decide whether the video is beneficial or relevant to their interests.
 
 Note: The tool operates by running the LLM (Gemma 2) locally with Ollama, which may result in some delays during each generation process.

projects.name: MSCMD (in development)
projects.description: A desktop notes application where users can create, organize, and save a variety of documents.

projects.name: Spring Boot Library API
projects.description: A simple library inventory API built with Spring Boot, allowing users to save and manage their favorite books.

soft_skills.name: Communication
soft_skills.description: Communication is an important aspect in software development, ensuring clarity, structure, and collaboration within a team. Therefore, I prioritize clear and open dialogue, whether it is technical or non-technical.

soft_skills.name: Teamwork
soft_skills.description: Teamwork is essential in order to achieve greater succes. I believe that open communication and mutual support achieves this. Hence I strive for a collaborative environment where each team member feels valued and heard.

soft_skills.name: Work Ethic
soft_skills.description: I strive to consistently demonstrate strong work ethic by showing dedication, responsibility and a commitment to delivering high-quality work. I believe that a positive attitude and a passion for continuous improvement are the key fundaments that drive both personal and team achievements.

soft_skills.name: Learning Agility
soft_skills.description: Staying curious, open to new ideas and eager to acquire new skills is a beneficial mindset that embraces continuous learning and adaptability. My commitment to learning agility allows me to stay ahead of industry trends and apply to the latest best practices.
